title: Projective Group Representations in Quaternionic Hilbert Space
abstract: We extend the discussion of projective group representations in quaternionic Hilbert space which was given in our recent book. The associativity condition for quaternionic projective representations is formulated in terms of unitary operators and then analyzed in terms of their generator structure. The multi--centrality and centrality assumptions are also analyzed in generator terms, and implications of this analysis are discussed.
